tool_description: An Enterprise-Grade API Service that enables you to retrieve Live Exchange Rates which are accurate and up-to-date. Get Currency Data based on Geolocation, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Market Popularity, Exchange Rate Risk/Exceeding, plus More. You're also able to access a vast array of Historical Exchange Rates and perform Currency Conversions. All World Currencies, Many Cryptocurrencies, and Precious Metals available! Free & Paid.
name: Ziff
title: Ziff

api_list.name: Exchange Rate Range
api_list.description: Get a list of Exchange Rates for a specific World Currency that is within a certain range.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ziff.p.rapidapi.com/range/GBP/1.2345/2.5678"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ziff.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ziff.p.rapidapi.com/range/{currencycode}/{lower}/{higher}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ziff.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Ziff Load
api_list.description: Get all Exchange Rates (for a specific Base Currency), that are higher than the specified amount.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ziff.p.rapidapi.com/load/GBP/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ziff.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ziff.p.rapidapi.com/load/{basecurrency}/{amount}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ziff.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Historical Rates
api_list.description: Get Historical Rates (10 Years) for a number of World Currencies.

        }
